name: tm12
effect: Teaches Taunt to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Taunt to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen II: Sweet Scent Gen I: Water Gun)

flavor_text.diamond_pearl: The foe is taunted into a rage that allows it to use only attack moves for two to four turns.
flavor_text.platinum: The foe is taunted into a rage that allows it to use only attack moves for two to four turns.
flavor_text.heartgold_soulsilver: The foe is taunted into a rage that allows it to use only attack moves for two to four turns.
